pullrequest.title: Model submission for X4 sensor config 2

content.raw:
Two things:

1. Please give me write access to your repository so I can push an update to your submission code resolving most of the issues I had.
2. Is there any particular reason your point LIDAR sensors use 2 beams as opposed to 1?  Since this is a modification to the XN series we’ll have to make sure it’s normalized across all platforms so I’m open to hearing a compelling case for the 2 beams as opposed to 1 at this point before this and/or the x1 config 6 PR is accepted.  Also what sensor is this based off of to have 20m range @ 20 Hz?  I based the other off of the LIDAR Lite v3 at 40m range @ 50 Hz.

‌
content.html:
Two things:

  1. Please give me write access to your repository so I can push an update to your submission code resolving most of the issues I had.
  2. Is there any particular reason your point LIDAR sensors use 2 beams as opposed to 1? Since this is a modification to the XN series we’ll have to make sure it’s normalized across all platforms so I’m open to hearing a compelling case for the 2 beams as opposed to 1 at this point before this and/or the x1 config 6 PR is accepted. Also what sensor is this based off of to have 20m range @ 20 Hz? I based the other off of the LIDAR Lite v3 at 40m range @ 50 Hz.

‌
